documents.title: Open roles EPD New ventures - 2026
documents.content:
Importance (1 low ... 5 very high),"If known, is this a backfill for whom?",Role is for which squad?,Plan for the role and any other useful context (e.g. why is a role planned and not open? Is the level correct? When do you think the role should be opened? ..) ,Oracle Cost Center Code,Role Status Name,Budget Reason Name,Employee ID,WD Position ID,Job Title,Location Name,Career Step Code,Career Step Name,Job Profile Name,Function/Alliance Name

3,Tamir Arnesty,Factor Form,This is a backfill for Tamir in the Factor Form squad who left in Oct and will be replaced with a CS4 FE dev. Since this whole squad is in Canada we will hire in Toronto. Active interviewing is ongoing but the role has been open a few months due to 2 candidates rejecting offers at the final stage,8191,Live,Replacement,,P324194,[TECH-CA] Software Developer [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,4,4 - Mid Level,Software Engineer,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

4,Brian Leach,Factor Form,"This is a backfill for Brian Leach in the Factor Form squad who left in Aug (due to US RTO policy) and will be replaced with a CS6 Staff Engineer focused on FE. Since this whole squad is in Canada we will hire in Toronto. Active interviewing is ongoing with us not uet finding the ideal candidate that has experience across web, Shopify and RN development",8191,Live,Replacement,,P157684,[TECH-CA] Staff Engineer - Frontend [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,6,6 - Expert Level / Team Lead,Staff Engineer L6,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

5,Troy Edwards,The Pets Table,"Although this is a net new product role, we technically repurposed the backfill/PID of an intern we had for NV for 3 months, Troy Edwards. This role product is critical due to the increased scope, context switching and team size that the TPT will see in 2026. This position has already been filled with Prateek Jajoo who starts in December",8191,Filled - Prateek Jajoo,Replacement,,P-3716758,[TECH] Staff Product Manager [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,7,"7 - Associate Director, Head of",Staff Product Manager,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

5,Simon Yates,Good Chop,"Although we are using the backfill of Simon Yates, a CS7 Sr. SE based in Canada, we are moving this role to a CS5 FE role based in DE supporting the GoodChop squad due to limited capacity with members on mat leave to deliver the long-term roadmap. We already have an internal transfer aligned from the Growth Alliance for Chiamaka Glory Nwolisa to fill this role starting Dec. We also think she is within 12 months of the SE promotion so we will aim for her to for her to fill the SE role in this squad long term",8191,Filled - Chiamaka,Replacement,,P324438,[TECH-CA] Senior Staff Engineer [TAM],CA - Ontario - 110 Spadina,7,"7 - Associate Director, Head of",Staff Engineer L7,Global Tech - TAM Expansion

4,Andre Protti,Market Innovation & Optimization,"This role is to backfill Andrei Protti, a CS4 BE role who will be placed inside MIO squad to support the BE side of initiatives. Opening this role was delayed since we initiaitlly tried to fill this in termporarily with a BE contractor role from Gri Dynamics, but no suitable candidates were found for 2 months, so we aligned on skipping this and just opening the role longer term ",8191,Live,Replacement,,P324438,[TECH] Backend Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,4,4 - Mid Level,Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering

2,Morteza Pourkazemi,Market Innovation & Optimization,This role is a CS5 BE backfill for Morteza who has been moved to Customer Profile Squad under Shopping Experience Tribe and will transition full time to



upport long-term TPT initaitves, mostly using the ""Away Model"" in other services.  The goal is to have this role filled by the end of Dec 2025 due to a backlog of BE initiaitves that need to be delivered for TPT early 2026.",8191,Filled - Vini,New,,P376382,[TECH] Senior Backend Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,5,5 - Experienced level,Senior Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering

1,,The Pets Table,This is a net new CS4 App/RN role aligned with Laurent Guillemain (CEO of TPT brand) and verbally approved by Dominic already which should be funded by the TPT PNL. We only plan to open this role closer to Q2 2025 when we have better visibility with the TPT app launch timelines. The goal is to have this role filled by the end of June 2026 if TPT app launch timelines are still for Q3 2026,8191,Pending,New,,,[TECH] Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,4,4 - Mid Level,Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering

1,,The Pets Table,This is a net new CS5 App/RN role aligned with Laurent Guillemain (CEO of TPT brand) and verbally approved by Dominic already which should be funded by the TPT PNL. We only plan to open this role closer to Q2 2025 when we have better visibility with the TPT app launch timelines. The goal is to have this role filled by the end of June 2026 if TPT app launch timelines are still for Q3 2026,8191,Pending,New,,,[TECH] Senior Software Engineer [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,5,5 - Experienced level,Senior Software Engineer,SE Tech New Ventures - Engineering

3,Deo Nathaniel,Good Chop,"This is the supporting Good Chop PO role, as the team expands to 10 people and the overal scope of the domain, it is necessary for Beatrice Dimarucut to have a supporting PO, especially as the team begins execution against a product-intensive content and lifestyle strategy for the brand.",,Pending,Replacement,,,[TECH] Senior Product Manager [TAM],DE - Berlin - Headquarters,5,5 - Experienced level,Senior Product Manager,SE Tech New Ventures - General

4,Marina Guthmann,Good Chop,"Marina will be existing HF, so we need a design subsctitute for Marina as soon as possible for the Good Chop team to continue executing at the velocitry we're looking for. ",,Pending,Replacement,,,[TECH] Senior Product Designer,DE - Berlin - Headquarters,6,6 - Expert Level / Team Lead,Senior Product Designer,SE Techg UX Design - General
